'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
The workshop is the heart of the research effort at [[Sayuka]], where the brightest minds of Rauatai work to unlock the secrets of the Archipelago - and more. The coralmasons try to uncover the secret of the coral growing so large in the vicinity of the island, while the engineers are... Well, the engineers are engineering a submarine. 

==Points of interest==
* A single, large room with coralmasons and engineers. Once you've delivered [[Iverra]], she will immediately correct the coralmason who tries to kick you are that you are, in fact, an invited guest. If [[Overgrowth]] is active, she will also provide you with [[Diving Equipment]] to reach [[Cignath MÃ³r]].

==Characters==
* [[Hetu]], an employee of the RDC and assistant to Iverra.

'''After [[A Matter of Import]]'''
* [[Iverra]], scientist
